songs.title: Right Now
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Keva

[Chorus]
I got so much fans right now
I'm just who they want right now
I think i’m the man right now
Getting to the bands right now
Mother needs a hand right now
So don't ask me any free shit now
Cause my grandma really sick right now
So gotta get all i need right now
Right now
I got so much fans right now
I'm just who they want right now
I think i’m the man right now

[Verse 1]
I hear your phone cut
I be losing it
Its going fast and
Im new to this
I need help im just tryna do this shit
Circle small cuz niggas fake in it
I don't need nobody else now
Cuz i learned just how to grind down
And nobody wanna help me
So strictly brothers coming with me
Switching up you niggas iffy
Niggas hating but they just envy
I'll be on my grind til you end me
But be ready cuz were fucking empty
Momma asking why i can't stop
Cuz we victim to the streets
Momma asking why i can't stop
Cuz we never getting beat
My big homies watching over me
Why i never lose my loyalty
My momma stressing ion wanna see
Had to raise us by her lonely

[Chorus]
I got so much fans right now
I'm just who they want right now
I think i'm the man right now
Getting to the bands right now
Mother needs a hand right now
So don't ask me any free shit now
Cause my grandma really sick right now
So gotta get all i need right now
Right now
I got so much fans right now
I’m just who they want right now
I think i’m the man right now

[Verse 2]
Ok twin size mattress
No lights in the ceilings
Life was straight madness
At 14 billing
Full of straight sadness
Don't know how i was dealing
Go through 12 tracklist right after it was doomsday
Starting writing rhymes ever since then i knew they would love the kid
So i grinded and like everyday
Eating strictly ramen any other food food bank
I had to do it
Get my momma better day
So when she lay away
(?) callista
I gotta get her off that 9-5 shit
Cause lately she been stressing bout some other shit
The food,the money and whatever falls under it

[Chorus]
I got so much fans right now
I’m just who they want right now
I think i'm the man right now
Getting to the bands right now
Mother needs a hand right now
So don't ask me any free shit now
Cause my grandma really sick right now
So gotta get all i need right now
